page.title: 05HORSINGTON GRANGE FARM
page.content:
We interviewed Mr Garfoot about his farm. The farm has 1850 acres (750 hectares). There are 42 fields. Machinery used on the farm is as follows: 10 tractors, 4 combine harvesters, 1 MB Trac 24 metre crop sprayer, 2 seed drills, 2 fertiliser spreaders, 2 Volvo industrial loaders, 10 items of cultivation equipment, and 5 machines used for deep subsoil cultivation. Crops grown by the farm are: milling wheat (for bread and biscuit making); feed wheat, used for animals; oil seed rape, used for cooking oil; field beans used for animal feed.
The farm employs two men permanently, and 10 men on a temporary basis.
